data.speaker: Administrator
data.content: Hey, welcome, how can I help you today?

data.speaker: Player
data.content: Hi! Erm... I'm looking to get my student ID.

data.speaker: Administrator
data.content: No problem, just go to stand in front of the camera, I will do the rest!

data.speaker: Player
data.content: (This is easy! She seems friendly. I don't know why I was so stressed out...)
